mean_en: the rank or title of a knight
word_etyma: knight 骑士+ hood 表示情况，状态→knighthood骑士身份
short_phrase: The Queen gives the knight his knighthood.
sentence: Because of his courage and his gentleness, the Queen admitted him to the order of knighthood.
sentence_trans: 因为他的勇气和文雅，女王册封他为骑士。
sentence_phrase: admitted him to the order of knighthood
